meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the culture of computers, information technology, and virtual reality.
meanings.sent1: The cyber world is vast and full of information.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys exploring cyber spaces on the internet.
meanings.sent3: The cyber party was a hit with all the virtual decorations.
meanings.sent4: In the cyber realm, data flows like a digital river.
meanings.sent5: His cyber skills are unmatched in the online community.

meanings.definition: Denoting a person or thing that is part of or involves the internet or virtual reality.
meanings.sent1: The cyber expert fixed the network issue quickly.
meanings.sent2: She received a cyber invitation to the virtual event.
meanings.sent3: The cyber cat chased the digital mouse on the screen.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a cyber library, storing endless online knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The cyber world welcomed her with open virtual arms.

meanings.definition: A prefix meaning relating to or involving computers or virtual reality.
meanings.sent1: He added the cyber prefix to the word to indicate its digital nature.
meanings.sent2: The cyber in cyberspace refers to the digital realm.
meanings.sent3: The cyber of cybernetics is essential for understanding modern technology.
meanings.sent4: In the world of coding, the cyber prefix is omnipresent.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the cyber prefix is key to navigating the digital world.
